Name: Circle of Protection: Art
Text: As Circle of Protection: Art enters the battlefield, choose an artist.\n{1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice with art by the chosen artist would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.\n{1}{W}: Return Circle of Protection: Art to its owner's hand.

Name: Glacial Ray
Text: Glacial Ray deals 2 damage to any target.\nSplice onto Arcane {1}{R} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

Name: Granny's Payback
Text: You gain life equal to your age.

Name: Mise
Text: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you draw three cards.

Name: Ashnod's Coupon
Text: {T}, Sacrifice Ashnod's Coupon: Target player gets you target drink. You pay any costs for the drink.

Name: Booster Tutor
Text: Open a sealed Magic booster pack, reveal the cards, and put one of them into your hand. (Remove that card from your deck before beginning a new game.)

Name: Darksteel Ingot
Text: Indestructible\n{T}: Add one mana of any color.

Name: Goblin Mime
Text: When you speak, sacrifice Goblin Mime.
